ticket.title: Docs for ActiveRecord::Locking::Pessimistic don't make sense
ticket.original-body:
The [online documentation for ActiveRecord::Locking::Pessimistic in Rails 3.0.6](http://api.rubyonrails.org/classes/ActiveRecord/Locking/Pessimistic.html) has a small error in it:
@@@ ruby shugo = Account.where("name = 'shugo'").lock(true).first yuko = Account.where("name = 'shugo'").lock(true).first @@@
It seems like the latter should have `where("name = 'yuko'")` instead.
